name: tdrgring

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c0, ctrg))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopDRing, c0 ∈ Ring, c0 ∈ TopRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, crg))

body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ TopRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ Ring)

comment: A topological division ring is a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
